v-model:show.description: Whether to display the action sheet
v-model:show.description_zh: Whether to display the action sheet

lock-scroll.description: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Dialog when disabled will not cause the body to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Dialog when disabled will not cause the body to scroll

close-on-click-action.description: Whether to close the actions sheet when clicking action
close-on-click-action.description_zh: Whether to close the actions sheet when clicking action

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to click the overlay to close the action sheet
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: Whether to click the overlay to close the action sheet

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the action sheet
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the action sheet

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safety zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: Whether to enable bottom safety zone adaptation

teleport.description: The location of the action sheet to mount
teleport.description_zh: The location of the action sheet to mount

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when selecting an action sheet
events.description_zh: Triggered when selecting an action sheet

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when opening an action sheet
events.description_zh: Triggered when opening an action sheet

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered when an action sheet open-animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when an action sheet open-animation ends

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when closing an action sheet
events.description_zh: Triggered when closing an action sheet

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered when an action sheet close-animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when an action sheet close-animation ends
